## About

I am a Professor at the [Institute of Social Science](https://www.iss.u-tokyo.ac.jp/), University of Tokyo. My research focuses on social stratification, educational inequality, and quantitative sociology.

## Current Position

**Professor** (2025年4月～)
[Center for Social Research and Data Archives](https://csrda.iss.u-tokyo.ac.jp/)
[Institute of Social Science, The University of Tokyo](https://www.iss.u-tokyo.ac.jp/)

## Research Interests

- Social stratification and mobility
- Educational inequality
- Quantitative methods
- Social survey methodology
